derivation.yuyuan_name: modern Latin, from Latin cyclaminos, from Greek kuklaminos, perhaps from kuklos 'circle', with reference to its bulbous roots

entry.tran: 仙客来(一种植物，开白色、粉色或红色花朵)
entry.def: A cyclamen is a plant with white, pink, or red flowers.

means.word_mean: 1. Mediterranean plant widely cultivated as a houseplant for its showy dark green leaves splotched with silver and nodding white or pink to reddish flowers with reflexed petals
